attributes.action: Nullifying premiership season to stop the potential spread of coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the spread of coronavirus
attributes.background: Cancel the 2019-2020 premier league football season to prevent the spread of corona.  Nullifying and wiping the year from the record books.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885
